channel.description: Puppet Learning VM Deprecated As of 2023, the Puppet Learning VM is no longer being maintained. The videos below demonstrate some of the features of Puppet, which can also be done on your Ubuntu VM after installing Puppet Agent. Unfortunately, it is not easily possible to simulate an enterprise Puppet setup without this VM, so I’ll keep these videos up for demonstration purposes. –Russ Resources Overview of Puppet’s Architecture from Puppet Video Script In this video, I’ll give a quick demonstration of what a true enterprise Puppet setup might look like.
